name: @waylay/distanceBetweenNodes
description:
Distance sensor allows you calculate distance between two nodes. Both nodes must return langitude and longitude in raw data.
Inputs parameters are
  • node1
  • node2
  • distance: distance between two nodes in km
It also shows two functions from waylayUtil package:
  • waylayUtil.getRawData() : to get raw data
  • waylayUtil.getDistance() :and to calculate a distance
Raw data:
  • distance
  • latitude1
  • longitude1
  • latitude2
  • longitude2
  • distanceConfigured
